title: Our visit here last time
review: We visited this temple while our stay here. The temple is situated in a great height. So senior persons may face difficulty to reach the temple. The view from the top is great, The temple area is calm & quite.

title: Good Place to visit on hill top
review: Good place to Visit. Many Devi[goddess] idol there. on the hill top so you can get other scenic view too.

title: nice place to take matas blessings
review: though its in a hight, but there are no staircase and good walkable road to walk. view from the temple is very good.

title: Worth visiting!
review: A beautiful  and peaceful temple with good walking access. Not much hype and crowd. Everyone should visit this temple.

title: Small temple, up a hill
review: It's a very small temple of Santura Devi (Ambe Mata) on a small hill. Usually included in the tour packages but can be skipped.

title: Divine place with full of divine peace
review: It a small beautiful temple located at hilly area , easy transport available from Mall road library square. The best part of this place u can find  a true spiritual peace although is situated at hilly area u need to walk little bit to reach the top of the temple. but ones u reach at top u can find a great peaceful view.

title: Goddess temple
review: This temple is on Mussoorie- Campty fall road, constructed and renovated with the help of  Mussoorie international school & Municipality funding. Good place to pray.

title: Fabulous Views
review: Though I did not visit the temple itself, but, we walked up to the temple which is a short 15min climb up a small hill. But, the views of Garhwal hills and valleys is amazing from this place. Do visit on your way to Kempty Falls.

title: Peaceful place to be
review: The temple of Devi is beautiful and peaceful. Very clean. The Murti of all the Devi's is so charismatic. Situated at the hill top, it also has a beautiful view.

title: Best Temple
review: I have been to many temples around mussoorie and other places in India. I find this is one of the best temples , where you get the mental peace after the visit as well as serves 360* View of the mountains

title: Peaceful Temple
review: The temple is located on Mussourie Kempty road.  The temple is 15 minutes walk on the hilly road.  The temple premises is double storied.  On ground floor their is a open air hall,  where you can sit and enjoy the view of mussourie.  On first floor is the main temple with idols of Maa Santura Devi,  Maa Gayatri Devi,  Maa Lakshmi Devi,  Maa Kali Devi.  The temple premises is clean and well maintained.

title: Peaceful environment
review: I fail to understand the why all Hindu religious places are always at a height where it becomes impossible for senior citizens and differently abled to reach the temple. The place is another example of this thinking

title: temple with a view
review: A beautiful temple, full of white colour, needs bit walk to reach from parking place. One can have darshan as well as can see the himalayan ranges from here. Its easily doable along with kepty fall, as its en route

title: Amazing Views and calm place
review: This temple is on way to Kempty falls road and around 10 mins uphill walk from the main road. Once you reach the temple, its very calm and peacefull. and the views are amazing. You can definitely spend some time there and take some good pictures.

title: Very Scenic and holy place
review: The temple is situated away from most places and you have to walk up for quite a bit to reach the temple. It is located at a very scenic place and is very clean.

title: Peaceful
review: This is a simple but nice temple. There is a certain serenity about this place. It gives you immense peace of mind.

title: This holy place is awesome
review: Must visit this place for beautiful sight scenes and feel the whether.

title: hidden attraction in mussoorie
review: it in the way of kempty fall. and 30 minutes trek. many less people come here but we liked it. we will visit again next year here

title: Nice walk
review: Being near our hotel, we walked up. Very serene with a beautiful view from the top. Can sit and enjoy the breeze and view

title: Divine temple
review: Beautiful and spiritual temple of Goddess Durga. Beautiful scenic views. Very peaceful. Must visit place

title: Beautiful temple on the way to kempty
review: A must visit for all...very much beautiful and spacious...view from top of the hill is awesome... small trek to temple is very energizing..

title: Local temple on top of a mountain can be reached after 100-150 steps
review: Local temple dedicated to Santhura Devi on top of a mountain that can be reached with a climb of 100-150 steps . Offers lovely views on a clear day.

title: Santura Devi Temple
review: Temple is very nice but you have to walk for 2 kms and path is steepe . the view from this temple is excellent.

title: The most Sacred place in Mussoorie Hill
review: The most Sacred place with touch of pure nature in Mussoorie Hills.. It has ultimate peace and I felt great calm there.

title: Tranquil spiritual experience at Mountain Top
review: It was worth the uphill climbing to the santura Devi temple. It has an amazing picturesque view point of the surrounding mountains.The Poojari doesn't demand anything and you can pray peacefully there. A wonderful calm place worth visiting in Mussorie.

title: Simple Temple Stunning Views
review: We were staying at the JW Marriot so went on a short trek to the temple as it was nearby. It is a steep climb but the hill to the temple has stairs so it is not very difficult. Once on top it was lovely. Breath taking views of the mountains and the valley.

title: An unexpected splendor in the middle of chaos and crowd
review: This temple was on the way to our lengthy and crowded drive to Kempty Falls. The temple is beautifully located on a hilltop. The architecture was wonderful and atmosphere was very harmonious with the surrounding hill. The best time spent on our entire trip was at this little hilltop temple.

title: Temple on top of a hill
review: Santura Devi Temple is located close to the JW Marriott Walnut Grove.  It is located on a hiltop and offers excellent views of the entire valley around.  The trek from the Marriott takes about 20 minutes and is not very strenuous.   You could also visit here on your way to Kempty Falls.

title: Serene Enviornment and nice view
review: Temple is located in a very serene enviornment and not that far from city. One can spend quality time there and enjoy the scenic beauty as temple is located on hill top. enjoyed and was blessed by visit.

title: Amazing Temple located at Beautiful location
review: Situated 12kms on the way to Kempty Falls, and then the trek of about 1 km, this holy shrine is known for its spiritual importance among the residents of Mussoorie. It is believed that the entire town of Mussoorie was saved from the wrath of the 1991 Uttarkashi earthquake by the Holy Divinity 'Santura Mata'. Hence, the name Santura Devi Mandir.

title: Top of the hill
review: You will get clear views of surroundings once you reach the temple. So, very nice place. I will visit again.

title: Nice temple
review: It's a nice temple amidst the hills of mussoorie. Nice view from the top. We went after seeing kempty fall. It's not so far from kempty falls. There are stairs to climb to reach the temple. But the climb is indeed worth!
